entries.name: US Department of Veterans Affairs
entries.details: Managed Kubernetes and Service Mesh (ISTIO) in Microservices architecture. Orchestrated microservices architecture with Kubernetes and Istio. Developed and consumed APIs with Go and Postgres. Implemented CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins and Docker. Implemented monitoring and alerting using Prometheus and Grafana.
entries.tools: AI, LLM, ML, Microservices, AWS, Kubernetes, React, Typescript, Next.js, D3.js, Go, Postgres, Agile/Scrum, HTML, SASS

entries.name: Newfront Insurance
entries.details: Developed new company website and mobile app. This included revamping the user flow across the product, creating a new design system, and expanding API endpoints.
entries.tools: React, Typescript, Next.js, AWS, D3.js, Go, Postgres, Agile/Scrum, HTML, SASS

entries.name: Avalara
entries.details: Developed next generation tax management software. Led team of five from start to finish including design, scoping, diagramming, development, testing, implementation, and maintenance in a Agile/Scrum environment.
entries.tools: React, Typescript, Python, Node.js, Postgres, AWS, Jira, Git, HTML, SASS

entries.name: Georgetown University
entries.details: Developed new graduate school website with a custom CMS for employees. Worked with UX and Design teams to translate feature specifications into a reusable code/template library. Refactored legacy codebase into modern MVC architecture application.
entries.tools: C#, Javascript, .Net, REST-API, MySQL, Jira, Git, HTML, SASS
